title: Ticket #4011: Condor_suspend man page doesn't say what suspending does
description: The man page for condor_suspend doesn't give any information about what suspending a job actually means (e.g., is the process killed?). A user has to dig through a bunch of other places in the manual to find out anything about what suspending actually means for the job.
check_ins: 2014-Jul-25 14:16   Check-in [40755]: put explanation for what suspend is in the condor_suspend man page #4011 (By Karen Miller )
creator: wenger
